page.title: 05FAMILY FOOD
page.content: SAMPLE DISHES FOR TYPICAL MEALS WERE TAKEN FROM FAMILY HOUSEHOLDS IN OUR AREA.THEY ARE AS FOLLOWS: BREAKFAST-TEA,COFFEE OR MILK CEREAL WITH MILK AND SUGAR TOAST WITH MARMALADE OR HONEY MIDMORNING-TEA OR COFFEE BISCUITS LUNCH-SALAD WITH CHEESE,EGG OR COLD MEAT SANDWICHES(VARIOUS FILLINGS) FRESH FRUIT OR CAKE TEA,COFFEE OR FRUIT DRINK MIDAFTERNOON-TEA,COFFEE OR FRUIT DRINK BISCUITS OR CAKE EVENING MEAL-MEAT OR POULTRY SERVED WITH A SELECTION OF VEGETABLES FRUIT,ICE-CREAM OR YOGHURT CHEESE AND BISCUITS COFFEE WINE OR BEER WITH MEAL
